scripts.cordova:build: npm run cordova:prepare && (cd "cd MyApp" && cordova build || echo "cordova not installed: skipping native build")
scripts.package: npm run package:web && npm run cordova:prepare
scripts.cordova:platform:add:android: (cd "cd MyApp" && (command -v cordova >/dev/null 2>&1 && cordova platform add android) || echo 'cordova not installed: run "npm i -g cordova" and ensure Android SDK installed')
scripts.cordova:platform:add:ios: (cd "cd MyApp" && (command -v cordova >/dev/null 2>&1 && cordova platform add ios) || echo 'cordova not installed: run "npm i -g cordova" and ensure Xcode installed')
scripts.cordova:platform:list: (cd "cd MyApp" && (command -v cordova >/dev/null 2>&1 && cordova platform ls) || echo 'cordova not installed')
scripts.cordova:platform:remove:android: (cd "cd MyApp" && (command -v cordova >/dev/null 2>&1 && cordova platform remove android) || echo 'cordova not installed')
scripts.cordova:platform:remove:ios: (cd "cd MyApp" && (command -v cordova >/dev/null 2>&1 && cordova platform remove ios) || echo 'cordova not installed')
